item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 20, 2025 at 9:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Finland announces migration of its rail network to international gauge (104 points | 56 comments)
2. Making Video Games (Without an Engine) in 2025 (137 points | 59 comments)
3. DDoSecrets publishes 410 GB of heap dumps, hacked from TeleMessage (419 points | 105 comments)
4. The Windows Subsystem for Linux is now open source (1323 points | 877 comments)
5. I got fooled by AI-for-science hype–here's what it taught me (149 points | 95 comments)
6. Have I Been Pwned 2.0 (557 points | 174 comments)
7. Questioning Representational Optimism in Deep Learning (16 points | 2 comments)
8. Jules: An Asynchronous Coding Agent (332 points | 135 comments)
9. What are people doing? Live-ish estimates based on global population dynamics (136 points | 54 comments)
10. Zod 4 (696 points | 204 comments)
11. The Entropy of Thought: Why Our Minds Gravitate Toward Divided Realities (10 points | 2 comments)
12. GitHub Copilot Coding Agent (430 points | 262 comments)
13. A shower thought turned into a Collatz visualization (107 points | 16 comments)
14. Solving physics-based initial value problems with unsupervised machine learning (9 points | 1 comment)
15. Ann, the Small Annotation Server (37 points | 4 comments)
16. Claude Code SDK (342 points | 153 comments)
17. Launch HN: Better Auth (YC X25) – Authentication Framework for TypeScript (210 points | 82 comments)
18. Run GitHub Actions locally (234 points | 94 comments)
19. Kilo: A text editor in less than 1000 LOC with syntax highlight and search (142 points | 22 comments)
20. A man who visited every country in the world without boarding a plane (2023) (57 points | 24 comments)
21. Biff – a batteries-included web framework for Clojure (35 points | 5 comments)
22. Game theory illustrated by an animated cartoon game (288 points | 46 comments)
23. Mary Queen of Scots Channel Anamorphosis, a 3D Simulation (5 points | discuss)
24. The forbidden railway: Vienna-Pyongyang (2008) (190 points | 61 comments)
25. Memory Consistency Models: A Tutorial (40 points | 2 comments)
26. Terraform MCP Server (75 points | 17 comments)
27. Remarks on AI from NZ (157 points | 83 comments)
28. xAI's Grok 3 comes to Microsoft Azure (135 points | 140 comments)
29. Too Much Go Misdirection (176 points | 81 comments)
30. WireGuard vanity keygen (85 points | 16 comments)
